Easter holiday road toll: Seven dead in four crashes over weekend, many others seriously injured https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/easter-holiday-road-toll-six-dead-in-four-crashes-over-weekend-many-others-seriously-injured/AIPQUBKQVZA3NMC4YOXLUJLEBQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/easter-holiday-road-toll-six-dead-in-four-crashes-over-weekend-many-others-seriously-injured/AIPQUBKQVZA3NMC4YOXLUJLEBQ/ Benjamin Plummer, Rachel MaherThe official Easter holiday period began at 4pm on Thursday and ends at 6am on Tuesday. Sun, 31 Mar 2024 20:16:00 +0000 Six people have died on New Zealand roads since 4pm on Thursday, the beginning of the Easter holiday road toll.
New Zealand cancer trial: CAR T-cell therapy for lymphoma, leukaemia and myeloma is saving lives https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-zealand-cancer-tri-car-t-cell-therapy-for-lymphoma-leukaemia-and-myeloma-is- saving-lives/OOJKYXKTOBFRDATY5UV63UWVNQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-zealand-cancer-tri-car-t-cell-therapy-for-lymphoma-leukaemia-and-myeloma-is- saving-lives/OOJKYXKTOBFRDATY5UV63UWVNQ/ Jamie MortonA groundbreaking, home-grown cancer therapy just passed another major milestone. Sun, 31 Mar 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Auckland poet Michele Leggott, pictured at her Devonport home, was once given just 12 months to live, after traditional therapies to beat her aggressive blood cancer failed. Thanks to CAR T-cell therapy, she's now cancer-free. Photo / Sylvie Whinray
